note: High tech hippie sharing photos & stories from the mountains. After experiencing a series of traumatic life events, I just traveled. Averaging 111 days a year on snow for the past 6 years. "I've learned you can go as far as you want in life, as long as you're willing to sacrifice a bit of comfort. Ask yourself and you will see, you can manifest destiny. Use your mind to create the opportunities you want to experience." Sharing some of the lessons and experiences I learned from.
